item.title: Getting started with random
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting random set up or installed. Fisher-Yates shuffle # Also known as the Knuth shuffle and the Durstenfeld-Fisher-Yates shuffle. This shuffle takes an array of n elements and shuffles it. The algorithm is truly random in that, after shuffling, each permutation of the array is equally likely. In java: public static void shuffle(E[] deck) { //From the end, swap each card with a random card from the unswapped portion.
